subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Sterling Gibbs sank a jump shot at the buzzer to beat No. 3 Villanova and send eighth-seeded Seton Hall into the Big East semifinals for the first time since 2001.
snippet: Sterling Gibbs sank a jump shot at the buzzer to beat No. 3 Villanova and send eighth-seeded Seton Hall into the Big East semifinals for the first time since 2001.
